english sentence: She works as a social media influencer promoting beauty products.
chinese sentence: 她的工作是社群網紅，推廣美妝產品。

meaning: 軟實力 (溝通、社交等能力)
english sentence: Employers value soft skills like teamwork and communication.
chinese sentence: 雇主重視像團隊合作和溝通這樣的軟實力。

english sentence: His speech gave us something to chew on.
chinese sentence: 他的演講給了我們一些值得深思的東西。

english sentence: I'll sound him out to see if he's interested in the job.
chinese sentence: 我會去探探他的口風，看他對這份工作有沒有興趣。

english sentence: When you mentioned pizza, you were speaking my language.
chinese sentence: 當你提到披薩時，簡直是說到我心坎裡了。

english sentence: Come on, spill the tea! What happened on your date?
chinese sentence: 快點，爆料一下！你約會發生了什麼事？

english sentence: Spoiler alert! The hero dies at the end.
chinese sentence: 劇透預警！主角最後死了。

english sentence: I didn't want to announce my news and steal her thunder on her wedding day.
chinese sentence: 我不想在她的婚禮上宣布我的消息，搶了她的風頭。

meaning: 接替某人的位置；設身處地
english sentence: It will be hard to step into the shoes of the previous manager.
chinese sentence: 要接替前任經理的位置將會很困難。

english sentence: We're going to be late! Step on it!
chinese sentence: 我們要遲到了！開快點！

english sentence: Salary is the main sticking point in the negotiations.
chinese sentence: 薪資是談判中的主要癥結。

english sentence: He loves to stir the pot by spreading rumors.
chinese sentence: 他喜歡透過散播謠言來煽風點火。

english sentence: This park used to be my old stomping ground when I was a kid.
chinese sentence: 這個公園是我小時候常來的老地盤。

english sentence: I'm not sure if it will work, but let's suck it and see.
chinese sentence: 我不確定這有沒有用，但試試看就知道了。

meaning: 為了集體利益犧牲自己
english sentence: I didn't want to work late, but I took one for the team.
chinese sentence: 我不想加班，但為了團隊我還是犧牲了。

meaning: 呵護某人；親自教導某人
english sentence: The manager took the new intern under her wing.
chinese sentence: 經理將這位新實習生納入麾下親自指導。

meaning: 往心裡去；認真對待 (批評/建議)
english sentence: Don't take his comments to heart; he was just joking.
chinese sentence: 別把他的評論往心裡去，他只是在開玩笑。

meaning: 真是太過分了；令人無語 (貶義)
english sentence: I've heard excuses before, but that one takes the biscuit.
chinese sentence: 我聽過藉口，但這個真是太扯了。

english sentence: After years of hesitation, they finally took the plunge and got married.
chinese sentence: 猶豫多年後，他們終於下定決心結婚了。

phrase/word: Take The Rough With The Smooth
meaning: 既來之則安之；逆來順受 (好壞都要接受)
english sentence: In any job, you have to take the rough with the smooth.
chinese sentence: 在任何工作中，你都必須接受好的一面和壞的一面。

english sentence: I'm too tired to drive; can you take the wheel?
chinese sentence: 我太累了開不動，你能接手掌舵嗎？

meaning: 聊工作；談公事 (在非工作場合)
english sentence: We're at a party, let's not talk shop.
chinese sentence: 我們在派對上，就別聊公事了吧。

meaning: 只會說不會做；嘴上功夫了得
english sentence: He can talk the talk, but can he walk the walk?
chinese sentence: 他嘴上說得頭頭是道，但他能付諸實行嗎？

english sentence: He doesn't know anything about cars; he's talking through his hat.
chinese sentence: 他根本不懂車，完全是在胡說八道。

meaning: 初期困難；創業初期的磨合問題
english sentence: The new software had some teething problems, but it works fine now.
chinese sentence: 這套新軟體初期有些問題，但現在運作正常。

meaning: 可不是嗎；我還用你說 (表示深有同感)
english sentence: Traffic is terrible today. "Tell me about it, I've been stuck for an hour."
chinese sentence: 「今天交通真糟。」「可不是嗎，我已經被卡了一個小時了。」

english sentence: Are you telling porkies again?
chinese sentence: 你又在撒謊了嗎？

meaning: (諷刺) 真是謝了；多謝你的"幫忙"
english sentence: You left the door open? Thanks a bunch.
chinese sentence: 你把門開著？真是謝了喔。

meaning: 那才怪呢；絕不可能有那天
english sentence: He buying a round of drinks? That'll be the day!
chinese sentence: 他會請大家喝酒？絕不可能有那天！

english sentence: You got wet because you didn't bring an umbrella? That'll teach you!
chinese sentence: 你沒帶傘所以淋濕了？這下得到教訓了吧！

meaning: 那是你的責任；怪你自己
english sentence: If you miss the deadline, that's on you.
chinese sentence: 如果你錯過了截止日期，那就是你自己的問題。

meaning: 兩全其美；魚與熊掌兼得
english sentence: Working part-time gives me the best of both worlds: money and free time.
chinese sentence: 兼職工作讓我也能兩全其美：既有錢賺又有自由時間。

english sentence: He is the CEO of arriving late.
chinese sentence: 他簡直是遲到大王。

english sentence: The coast is clear; you can come out now.
chinese sentence: 四下無人，你現在可以出來了。

english sentence: The flip side of living in the city is the noise.
chinese sentence: 住在城市的另一面缺點就是噪音。

phrase/word: The Gift That Keeps On Giving
meaning: 受益無窮的事物 (有時用於諷刺沒完沒了的麻煩)
english sentence: This subscription is the gift that keeps on giving; I get new content every month.
chinese sentence: 這個訂閱真是讓人受益無窮，我每個月都能獲得新內容。

english sentence: The deadline is tomorrow, so the heat is on.
chinese sentence: 截止日期是明天，壓力來了。

meaning: 小丑竟是你自己；自作自受
english sentence: You thought you tricked me, but the joke is on you.
chinese sentence: 你以為你騙到了我，結果小丑竟是你自己。

english sentence: Can I bring a friend? Sure, the more the merrier.
chinese sentence: 我可以帶朋友來嗎？當然，人越多越熱鬧。

english sentence: In this industry, networking is the name of the game.
chinese sentence: 在這個行業，建立人脈是成功的關鍵。

meaning: 案情/局勢變得撲朔迷離
english sentence: The plot thickens! We just found a mysterious letter.
chinese sentence: 案情變得撲朔迷離了！我們剛發現一封神秘信件。

english sentence: When we visited them, they gave us the royal treatment.
chinese sentence: 當我們去拜訪他們時，他們給予了我們貴賓級的款待。

english sentence: I'll have a hot dog with the works - mustard, ketchup, and onions.
chinese sentence: 我要一份加全套配料的熱狗——芥末、番茄醬和洋蔥都要。

english sentence: Using this machine is easy; there's nothing to it.
chinese sentence: 使用這台機器很容易，沒什麼難的。

english sentence: Why do I have this scar? Ah, thereby hangs a tale.
chinese sentence: 為什麼我有這道疤？唉，這說來話長。

meaning: (俚語) 渴望關注；飢渴 (求讚/求愛)
english sentence: Posting those photos is a bit thirsty, isn't it?
chinese sentence: 發那些照片有點太渴望博取關注了吧？

english sentence: After trying for hours, he finally threw in the towel.
chinese sentence: 嘗試了幾個小時後，他終於認輸放棄了。

phrase/word: Throw One's Toys Out The Pram
meaning: (像小孩一樣) 發脾氣；無理取鬧
english sentence: When he didn't get his way, he threw his toys out the pram.
chinese sentence: 當事情不如他意時，他就像小孩一樣亂發脾氣。

english sentence: She was throwing shade at her rival in the interview.
chinese sentence: 她在訪談中暗諷她的競爭對手。

meaning: 虎媽 (嚴格教育子女的母親)
english sentence: Her tiger mother made her practice piano for four hours a day.
chinese sentence: 她的虎媽逼她每天練四小時鋼琴。

english sentence: He was late, but to be fair, the traffic was terrible.
chinese sentence: 他是遲到了，但平心而論，交通真的很糟。

meaning: 提神醒腦；煥然一新 (通常指外出呼吸新鮮空氣)
english sentence: A walk on the beach will help blow the cobwebs away.
chinese sentence: 去海灘散散步有助於提神醒腦。

phrase/word: To Cut A Long Story Short
english sentence: To cut a long story short, we missed the flight.
chinese sentence: 長話短說，我們錯過了班機。

meaning: 初試身手；獲得初步經驗
english sentence: He cut his teeth in journalism working for a local paper.
chinese sentence: 他在一家地方報社工作，初試身手累積新聞經驗。

english sentence: She fought tooth and nail to keep custody of her children.
chinese sentence: 她為了保有孩子的監護權而竭盡全力拚搏。

phrase/word: To Kick (Something) Into The Long Grass
meaning: 束之高閣；無限期擱置 (問題等)
english sentence: The government decided to kick the proposal into the long grass.
chinese sentence: 政府決定將該提案無限期擱置。

phrase/word: To Put Someone On The Map
meaning: 讓...出名；讓...佔有一席之地
english sentence: That movie really put the actor on the map.
chinese sentence: 那部電影真的讓這位演員一舉成名。

phrase/word: To Shout It From The Rooftops
meaning: 大聲宣揚；讓全世界知道
english sentence: I'm so happy I want to shout it from the rooftops!
chinese sentence: 我太開心了，恨不得讓全世界都知道！

english sentence: The magician made the rabbit vanish into thin air.
chinese sentence: 魔術師讓兔子憑空消失了。

meaning: 搞不清楚狀況；不識相；(公關) 災難
english sentence: His comments were completely tone deaf to the public mood.
chinese sentence: 他的評論完全沒搞清楚大眾的情緒。

english sentence: The service at this hotel is absolutely top-notch.
chinese sentence: 這家飯店的服務絕對是一流的。

meaning: (網路用語) 出去走走；回歸現實 (諷刺人沈迷網路)
english sentence: You've been online all day, you need to go touch grass.
chinese sentence: 你整天都在上網，該出去走走回歸現實了。

english sentence: The training was hard, but he decided to tough it out.
chinese sentence: 訓練很艱苦，但他決定硬著頭皮撐下去。

english sentence: I want to help, but I don't want to tread on anyone's toes.
chinese sentence: 我想幫忙，但我不想得罪人或越權。

english sentence: The movie's ending really tugged at the heartstrings.
chinese sentence: 電影的結局真的觸動了我的心弦。

english sentence: After the incident, he promised to turn over a new leaf.
chinese sentence: 事件過後，他承諾要改過自新。

english sentence: I was just sitting there twiddling my thumbs waiting for the meeting to start.
chinese sentence: 我只是坐在那裡無所事事，等著會議開始。

english sentence: It took him a while to twig that we were planning a surprise party.
chinese sentence: 他過了好一陣子才突然明白我們在籌劃驚喜派對。

english sentence: I didn't want to go, but he twisted my arm.
chinese sentence: 我本來不想去，但他硬要我去。

english sentence: He muttered something under his breath that I couldn't hear.
chinese sentence: 他低聲嘀咕了一些我聽不到的話。

english sentence: I'm up to my eyes in paperwork right now.
chinese sentence: 我現在被文書工作忙得不可開交。

english sentence: You need to up your game if you want to win.
chinese sentence: 如果你想贏，就得提升你的表現。

english sentence: His taste in music is very vanilla.
chinese sentence: 他的音樂品味非常普通乏味。

english sentence: This place has a really chill vibe.
chinese sentence: 這個地方的氛圍很放鬆。

meaning: 胡扯；喋喋不休 (講沒重點的話)
english sentence: Stop waffling on and get to the point.
chinese sentence: 別再胡扯了，講重點。

english sentence: Can you walk me through the installation process?
chinese sentence: 你能一步步引導我完成安裝過程嗎？

meaning: 包含所有缺點；毫無保留
english sentence: I love him, warts and all.
chinese sentence: 我愛他的一切，包含他的所有缺點。

meaning: 掃興的人/事；沈悶的時光
english sentence: His face was as miserable as a wet weekend.
chinese sentence: 他的臉色像陰雨的週末一樣悲慘/掃興。

english sentence: The company hired a computer whizz-kid to fix their security.
chinese sentence: 公司雇了一位電腦神童來修復他們的安全系統。

english sentence: The price is fixed; there is no wiggle room.
chinese sentence: 價格是固定的，沒有議價空間。

english sentence: You can't just throw clothes into the suitcase willy-nilly.
chinese sentence: 你不能就這樣隨意地把衣服亂塞進手提箱。

english sentence: Our team will win hands down if we play like this.
chinese sentence: 如果我們這樣打，絕對能輕易獲勝。

english sentence: I didn't prepare for the speech, so I'll just have to wing it.
chinese sentence: 我沒準備演講，所以只能即興發揮了。

english sentence: Don't be so wishy-washy; pick a restaurant!
chinese sentence: 別這麼優柔寡斷，選一家餐廳吧！

meaning: 覺醒 (對社會正義議題)；政治正確
english sentence: Some people criticize the new movie for being too woke.
chinese sentence: 有些人批評這部新電影太過政治正確。

meaning: 工作假期 (邊工作邊度假)
english sentence: I'm going on a workation to Bali next month.
chinese sentence: 下個月我要去峇里島邊工作邊度假。

english sentence: Are you happy? "Yes and no; I like the job but the commute is long."
chinese sentence: 「你開心嗎？」「既是也不是；我喜歡這份工作但通勤時間太長。」

meaning: 哎呀；糟糕 (表示震驚或擔憂)
english sentence: Yikes! Look at that price tag.
chinese sentence: 哎呀！看看那個價格標籤。

meaning: (俚語) 活在當下 (You Only Live Once)
english sentence: I bought the expensive shoes. YOLO!
chinese sentence: 我買了那雙昂貴的鞋子。人生只有一次嘛！

english sentence: You can't go wrong with a classic black dress.
chinese sentence: 選經典的黑色洋裝準沒錯。

meaning: 真讓人難以置信 (荒謬得像編的一樣)
english sentence: The train was cancelled because of 'strong sunshine'. You couldn't make it up!
chinese sentence: 火車因為「陽光太強」而取消，真讓人難以置信！

english sentence: I don't agree with your choice, but you do you.
chinese sentence: 我不認同你的選擇，但隨你便吧

english sentence: Oh, flowers for me? You shouldn't have!
chinese sentence: 噢，送我的花？你太客氣了！

meaning: (俚語) 稍微修飾；讓...更有型 (通常說 zhuzh up)
english sentence: Let me just zhuzh up the cushions before the guests arrive.
chinese sentence: 客人在來之前，讓我把靠墊稍微整理得更有型一點。

english sentence: Adding some chili gives the dish a bit of zing.
chinese sentence: 加點辣椒讓這道菜多了一點刺激的風味。

english sentence: Zip it! I don't want to hear any more excuses.
chinese sentence: 閉嘴！我不想再聽任何藉口。
